		-- (24.4,-43.2);
	\def\xc{{70.1, 47.9, 39.4, 30.9, 28.5, 26.2, 25.3, 24.4}}
	\def\yc{{-62.8, -43.6, -46.2, -45.8, -42.1, -41.7, -42.9, -43.2}}
	\def\rads{{29.25, 9.0, 6.6, 4.1, 2.2, 1.4, 1.0}}
	\foreach \k in {0,1,...,6}{
		\pgfmathsetmacro{\xa}{\xc[\k]}
		\pgfmathsetmacro{\ya}{\yc[\k]}
		\pgfmathsetmacro{\xb}{\xc[\k+1]}
		\pgfmathsetmacro{\yb}{\yc[\k+1]}
		\draw[circ, col\k] (\xa,\ya) circle (\rads[\k]);
		\fill[col\k] (\xa,\ya) circle (0.5);
		\draw[rad, col\k] (\xa,\ya) -- (\xb,\yb);
	}
\end{tikzpicture}
